Customer: Hello. Hmm hmm. Pharmaceutical me jo hai business competition jyada hai. Hmm. Competition jyada hai har jagah hai. Hai na to hamare paas ek sir ne aapko bataya hoga TrustSeal ke bare me usme kya hota hai. Usme apne paas samne se call aur inquiry ka ratio badh jata hai samne se call jyada aati hai usme. Lekin isme kyu nahi aa raha hai. Sir ye dekhiye basic package ye ye jo hamara basic package hai yaha pe crowd bahut hai. Yaha jo bhi India me registered karta hai wo direct basic package se hi start karta hai hai na basic package se. Ab aap sochiye agar aapka competition 100 logo me hai to waha pe jyada hogi ki aapka competition 20 logo me waha pe jyada hoga. Aapko performance better kaha pe hogi 20 logo me hogi na sir crowd to bahut ho gaya agar 10. 100 logo me hai ki mai mai 32000 deke abhi pareshan hu. Wo TrustSeal wala kitne ka hai. Lekin aap TrustSeal me agar aapko jana hai to aap jaiye TrustSeal do saal me. Waha pe aapka bahut accha benefit hai sir dekhiye waha benefit kya hai. Jo sir do saal ka price hai wo hai 75000 plus GST aur ek saal ka price hai 45000 plus GST. Nahi to abhi ye jo jama kiya hua usme se kitna nahi nahi usme aapko adjust ho jayega. Mai abhi ek kaam karta hu aapko iska proposal bana ke do saal ka bata hu kitna discount me aapko provide kara sakta hu aap kitna kar dijiye aap hai na aur dekhiye mere according aapka jo yaha pe aayega na samne 50000 ke aas paas kuch aayega. Do saal ka abhi ab dekhiye samne 50 se 55 ke beech me aayega approx mai exact nahi bata raha hu lekin aapka jo 50 se 55 ke beech me aayega aur dekhiye aap is is saal ka aur do saal ka dono bana ke do saal ka do saal ka 50 mai deta hu aur dekhiye mai aapko bata deta hu ek cheez jaise abhi aapko package diye hai ab agle saal aapko package free denge. Ye basic package ka isme TrustSeal karenge is saal TrustSeal karenge agle saal mujhe 50 denge to is saal bhi aap TrustSeal chalayenge aur agle saal bhi aapka TrustSeal chalega isme aapka jyada better rahega baki mai Manish se proposal bana ke bhijwata hu aapko theek hai. Maine do TrustSeal wale buyer se baat ki hai unhone kaha ki mere aisa kuch nahi hai koi bahut benefit nahi hai balki ROI bhi nahi nikal pa raha hai. Theek nahi to aap mujhe kaise rukiye ek minute rukiye aapki city konsi hai district DR me a raha hu hamara jo main product hai wo hai free and probiotic capsule theek hai. Hmm. Hello. Ha ha dekhiye mai yaha dalta hu Gorakhpur Gorakhpur Dada Gorakhpur to aa gaya wait wait. Ab dekhiye yaha pe hamare paas Gorakhpur me bahut sare hai Ron medic care hai ya guru hai sixper hai hai na Kanha pharma hai. Hmm. Jante hai na kisi ko aap. Ha Kanha pharma ko jante hai. Aur ek hai medic care pharma private limited ko jante hai medic care ko jante hai. Jante hai medic care ko jante hai medic care. Ab sir dekhiye inke paas ek mahine kitni call aa rahi hai 40 48 63 ek mahine me aapke paas ek mahine kitni call aa rahi hai do teen agar ab mai direct inquiry ki baat karu direct inquiry inke paas aa rahi hai 530 574 563 aapke paas kitni aa rahi hai 30 35 aise aa rahi hai. To ab bataiye kisko aur ye dekhiye ek bhi relevant nahi hai ye keh raha hu mai. 30 35 bhi bahut hota hai relevant nahi hai. Aap by lead by lead ki baat kar rahe hai direct inquiry matlab hota hai customer samne se aapko message kar raha hai ki mujhe is item ki requirement hai. Is market iske vajah se waha pe aur jyada se jyada aate hai. Hmm hmm. Samajh rahe hai. Baki mai ek baar aapko proposal bhijwata hu Manish se aur agar aapko jyada acche se jana hai to ek baar video meet pe aaiyega aur acche se better aapko dikha paunga aur jo jyada customer hai jinko aap jante hai unki profile bhi aapke samne dikhaunga aur aapki profile bhi dikhaunga tab aapko dikhega difference kya hai usme aapme 5 baje meeting rakha jaye. 5 baje jo aap bata de. Ha 5 baje rakh rahe hai. Theek hai sir theek hai. Theek hai sir. Baki mai na tumko nahi nahi jab tak tab tak aap price humko bhej dijiye ki mujhe kitna ek saal ke liye kitna dena padega do saal ke liye kitna dena padega. Theek hai mai karta hu theek hai theek theek.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing issues with current IndiaMART services.

- No orders, poor response on calls.

- Doubts about the benefits of TrustSeal.

- Dissatisfied with current leads and ROI.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the benefits of TrustSeal.

- Executive offered a video meet to explain TrustSeal.

- Executive offered to send a proposal for TrustSeal.

- Executive offered a discount on TrustSeal package.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a proposal for TrustSeal.

- Video meet scheduled at 5 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, subscription, buyleads, competition

seller_categories.mcat_name: Polyethylene glycol and Propylene Glycol Eye Drop
